location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市海淀区
location.en: Haidian District, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所公立体育大学，由国家体育总局主管，是国家“双一流”世界一流学科建设高校和原“211工程”重点建设院校。
description.en: A public university for sports located in Beijing, China. It is administered by the General Administration of Sport of China and is a national 'Double First-Class' university and a former Project 211 university.

en: General Administration of Sport of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管体育工作的直属机构，是北京体育大学的主管部门。
description.en: A direct agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for sports affairs and the governing body of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任北京体育大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Party Committee Secretary of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 中国体育界官员，现任北京体育大学校长。
description.en: Chinese sports official, current President of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者之一。其著作《体育之研究》中的一句话被用作北京体育大学的校训精神。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, one of the main founders of the People's Republic of China. A phrase from his work 'A Study of Physical Education' is used as the spirit of Beijing Sport University's motto.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1917年发表于《新青年》的文章，其中“文明其精神，野蛮其体魄”一句成为北京体育大学的校训精神。
description.en: An article published by Mao Zedong in 'New Youth' in 1917. The phrase 'Civilize the mind, and make savage the body' from it became the spirit of Beijing Sport University's motto.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪初期中国的一份革命杂志，曾刊登毛泽东的《体育之研究》。
description.en: A revolutionary Chinese magazine in the early 20th century, which published Mao Zedong's 'A Study of Physical Education'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。1952年决定创办北京体育大学（时称中央体育学院）。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work. It decided to establish Beijing Sport University (then Central Institute of Physical Culture) in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一个全国性体育社会团体，曾在北京体育大学建校初期进行业务指导。
description.en: A national sports organization in China that provided professional guidance to Beijing Sport University in its early days.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名综合性大学。其体育系是1953年成立中央体育学院（北京体育大学前身）的基础。
description.en: A renowned comprehensive university in China. Its Department of Physical Education formed the basis for the establishment of the Central Institute of Physical Culture (predecessor of Beijing Sport University) in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学（含前身）首任院长及长期担任党委书记。
description.en: The first president and long-term Party Committee Secretary of Beijing Sport University (including its predecessors).

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。曾于2019年给北京体育大学研究生冠军班回信。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He wrote a reply letter to the graduate champion class of Beijing Sport University in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学前党委书记、校长。2024年3月因涉嫌严重违纪违法接受调查。
description.en: Former Party Committee Secretary and President of Beijing Sport University. He was placed under investigation for suspected serious violations of discipline and law in March 2024.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal control institution of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会
en: National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家监察机关。
description.en: The highest state supervisory agency of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的最高地方国家行政机关。北京体育大学曾由其与国家体委双重领导。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Beijing, People's Republic of China. Beijing Sport University was once under its dual leadership with the State Sports Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会
en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关。北京体育大学的党组织关系隶属于该委员会。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Beijing. The party organization of Beijing Sport University is affiliated with this committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于加拿大的公立研究型大学，与北京体育大学合办阿尔伯塔国际休闲体育与旅游学院。
description.en: A public research university in Canada, which co-founded the Alberta International Institute of Leisure, Recreation and Tourism with Beijing Sport University.

nodes.id: 阿尔伯塔国际休闲体育与旅游学院

zh-cn: 阿尔伯塔国际休闲体育与旅游学院
en: Alberta International Institute of Leisure, Recreation and Tourism

location.zh-cn: 海南省陵水黎族自治县

description.zh-cn: 由北京体育大学与加拿大阿尔伯塔大学合作创办的中外合作办学机构。
description.en: A Chinese-foreign cooperatively-run educational institution jointly established by Beijing Sport University and the University of Alberta, Canada.

zh-cn: 国家体育总局秦皇岛训练基地

description.zh-cn: 位于河北省秦皇岛市的国家体育总局训练基地，2017年加挂北京体育大学秦皇岛校区牌子。
description.en: A training base of the General Administration of Sport of China located in Qinhuangdao, Hebei, which also became the Qinhuangdao campus of Beijing Sport University in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育学院前院长。
description.en: Former President of Beijing Institute of Physical Education.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育学院前院长。
description.en: Former President of Beijing Institute of Physical Education.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学前校长、党委书记。
description.en: Former President and Party Committee Secretary of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学前校长、党委书记。
description.en: Former President and Party Committee Secretary of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学前校长。
description.en: Former President of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学前校长、党委书记。
description.en: Former President and Party Committee Secretary of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学前校长。
description.en: Former President of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 中央体育学院筹备处主任，后任副院长、临时党支部书记。
description.en: Director of the Preparatory Office of the Central Institute of Physical Culture, later served as Vice President and temporary Party Branch Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 位于德国科隆的体育大学，是北京体育大学的国际交流合作院校。
description.en: A sports university located in Cologne, Germany, and an international exchange partner of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国的公立研究型大学，是北京体育大学的国际交流合作院校。
description.en: A public research university in the UK and an international exchange partner of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 自1952年国家体委（国家体育总局前身）成立后，北京体育大学长期由其直接领导。
description.en: Since the establishment of the State Sports Commission (predecessor of the General Administration of Sport) in 1952, Beijing Sport University has been under its direct leadership for a long period.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 1952年，中华人民共和国教育部决定创办中央体育学院（北京体育大学前身）。
description.en: In 1952, the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China decided to establish the Central Institute of Physical Culture (predecessor of Beijing Sport University).

description.zh-cn: 1953年，中央体育学院（北京体育大学前身）以北京师范大学体育系为基础成立。
description.en: In 1953, the Central Institute of Physical Culture (predecessor of Beijing Sport University) was established based on the Department of Physical Education of Beijing Normal University.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 1979年起，北京体育大学隶属教育部和国家体委双重领导，以国家体委为主。
description.en: Since 1979, Beijing Sport University has been under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Education and the State Sports Commission, with the latter being the primary authority.

description.zh-cn: 1972年至1979年间，北京体育学院归国家体委和北京市双重领导。
description.en: Between 1972 and 1979, Beijing Institute of Physical Education was under the dual leadership of the State Sports Commission and the Beijing Municipality.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学的党的关系隶属中共北京市委。
description.en: The party organization of Beijing Sport University is affiliated with the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 建校筹备初期，中华全国体育总会对中央体育学院进行业务指导。
description.en: During the early preparatory stage, the All-China Sports Federation provided professional guidance to the Central Institute of Physical Culture.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东《体育之研究》中的“文明其精神，野蛮其体魄”一句被用作北京体育大学的校训精神。
description.en: The phrase 'Civilize the mind, and make savage the body' from Mao Zedong's 'A Study of Physical Education' is used as the spirit of Beijing Sport University's motto.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东撰写《体育之研究》并发表于《新青年》杂志。
description.en: Mao Zedong wrote 'A Study of Physical Education' and had it published in the 'New Youth' magazine.

description.zh-cn: 《体育之研究》发表于《新青年》第三卷2号。
description.en: 'A Study of Physical Education' was published in 'New Youth', Volume 3, Issue 2.

description.zh-cn: 习近平给北京体育大学2016级研究生冠军班全体学生回信，对他们提出勉励和期望。
description.en: Xi Jinping sent a reply letter to all students of the 2016 graduate champion class at Beijing Sport University, offering them encouragement and expectations.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学原党委书记曹卫东因涉嫌严重违纪违法，接受中央纪委国家监委的纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: Cao Weidong, former Party Secretary of Beijing Sport University, was investigated by the CCDI and NSC for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学原党委书记曹卫东因涉嫌严重违纪违法，接受中央纪委国家监委的纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: Cao Weidong, former Party Secretary of Beijing Sport University, was investigated by the CCDI and NSC for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

relationships.target: 阿尔伯塔国际休闲体育与旅游学院

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学与加拿大阿尔伯塔大学合作创办了阿尔伯塔国际休闲体育与旅游学院。
description.en: Beijing Sport University co-founded the Alberta International Institute of Leisure, Recreation and Tourism with the University of Alberta, Canada.

relationships.target: 阿尔伯塔国际休闲体育与旅游学院

description.zh-cn: 加拿大阿尔伯塔大学与北京体育大学合作创办了阿尔伯塔国际休闲体育与旅游学院。
description.en: The University of Alberta, Canada, co-founded the Alberta International Institute of Leisure, Recreation and Tourism with Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 2017年，国家体育总局秦皇岛训练基地（中国足球学校）加挂北京体育大学秦皇岛校区牌子。
description.en: In 2017, the Qinhuangdao Training Base of the General Administration of Sport (China Football School) also became the Qinhuangdao Campus of Beijing Sport University.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学与德国科隆体育大学建立了友好校际关系。
description.en: Beijing Sport University has established a friendly inter-university relationship with German Sport University Cologne.

description.zh-cn: 北京体育大学与英国拉夫堡大学是友好院校。
description.en: Beijing Sport University and Loughborough University in the UK are friendly institutions.
